name: G√©n√©ration et Qualification de Leads avec GPT-4o, Google Workspace et Suivi Automatis√©
description:
# üöÄ Mod√®le de G√©n√©ration de Leads et de Suivi AI

## üìã Aper√ßu

Ce mod√®le de workflow n8n automatise votre processus de g√©n√©ration de leads et de suivi en utilisant l'IA. Il capture des leads via un formulaire, les enrichit avec des donn√©es d'entreprise, les classe en diff√©rentes cat√©gories et envoie automatiquement des s√©quences de suivi appropri√©es.

### Caract√©ristiques Cl√©s :
- ü§ñ Classification des leads aliment√©e par l'IA (Pr√™t pour la d√©mo, Nurture, Abandonner)
- üìä Enrichissement automatique des leads avec des donn√©es d'entreprise
- üìß R√©ponses par email intelligentes et s√©quences de suivi
- üìÖ Planification automatis√©e de d√©mos pour les leads qualifi√©s
- üìù Journalisation compl√®te des leads dans Google Sheets
- üí¨ Assistant IA pour des r√©ponses imm√©diates aux requ√™tes

## üõ†Ô∏è Pr√©requis

Avant de configurer ce workflow, assurez-vous d'avoir :

1. **Instance n8n** : Version auto-h√©berg√©e ou cloud
2. **Cl√© API OpenAI** : Pour les fonctionnalit√©s aliment√©es par l'IA
3. **Compte Google Workspace** avec :
   - Acc√®s Gmail
   - Google Sheets
   - Google Calendar
4. **Compr√©hension de base** de votre Profil Client Id√©al (ICP)

## ‚ö° Guide de D√©marrage Rapide

### √âtape 1 : Importer le Workflow
1. Copiez le JSON du workflow
2. Importez-le dans votre instance n8n
3. Le workflow appara√Ætra avec tous les n≈ìuds connect√©s

### √âtape 2 : Configurer les Identifiants
Vous devrez configurer les identifiants suivants :
- **API OpenAI** : Pour les agents IA et la classification
- **Gmail OAuth2** : Pour l'envoi d'emails
- **Google Sheets OAuth2** : Pour la journalisation des leads
- **Google Calendar OAuth2** : Pour la planification des d√©mos

### √âtape 3 : Cr√©er Votre Feuille de Journalisation des Leads
Cr√©ez une feuille Google avec ces colonnes :
- Date
- Nom
- Email
- Entreprise
- Titre du Poste
- Message
- Nombre d'Employ√©s
- Industrie
- G√©ographie
- Chiffre d'Affaires Annuel
- Technologie
- Points de Douleur
- Classification des Leads

### √âtape 4 : Mettre √† Jour les N≈ìuds de Configuration
1. **Remplacer l'ID de la Feuille** : Mettez √† jour tous les n≈ìuds Google Sheets avec votre ID de feuille
2. **Mettre √† Jour les Mod√®les d'Email** : Personnalisez tout le contenu des emails
3. **D√©finir l'Email d'Escalade** : Remplacez "your-email@company.com" par l'email de votre √©quipe
4. **Configurer les Crit√®res ICP** : √âditez le n≈ìud "D√©finir les Crit√®res ICP et de Leads"

## üéØ Configuration de la Classification des Leads

### D√©finir Votre ICP (Profil Client Id√©al)

√âditez le n≈ìud "D√©finir les Crit√®res ICP et de Leads" pour d√©finir vos crit√®res :

#### üìå Exemple de Crit√®res ICP :
```
- Taille de l'Entreprise : 50+ employ√©s
- Industrie : SaaS, Finance, Sant√©, Fabrication
- G√©ographie : Am√©rique du Nord, Europe
- Points de Douleur : Processus manuels, besoins de conformit√©, d√©fis de mise √† l'√©chelle
- Chiffre d'Affaires Annuel : 5M$+
```

#### ‚úÖ Crit√®res Pr√™t pour la D√©mo :
Prospects √† haute intention qui r√©pondent √† plusieurs facteurs de qualification :
- Grande taille d'entreprise (votre seuil)
- Points de douleur clairs mentionn√©s
- Chronologie urgente
- Autorit√© budg√©taire indiqu√©e
- Demandes de solution sp√©cifiques

#### üå± Crit√®res Nurture :
Prospects avec un potentiel futur :
- R√©pondent aux exigences de taille de base
- Dans l'industrie cible
- Int√©r√™t g√©n√©ral exprim√©
- Planification d'une mise en ≈ìuvre future
- Exploration d'options

#### ‚ùå Crit√®res Abandonner :
Abandonnez uniquement les leads qui ne correspondent clairement pas :
- En dehors de la g√©ographie cible
- Mauvaise industrie (B2C si vous √™tes B2B)
- Trop petit sans croissance
- D√©j√† avec un concurrent
- Messages de spam ou de test

## üìß Personnalisation des Emails

### Personnaliser les S√©quences de Suivi :

#### S√©quence Pr√™t pour la D√©mo :
1. Invitation au calendrier imm√©diate
2. Confirmation de d√©mo personnalis√©e
3. Rappel de r√©union (optionnel)

#### S√©quence Nurture :
1. Email de bienvenue avec des ressources
2. Contenu √©ducatif (Jour 2)
3. Invitation √† un webinaire/√©v√©nement (Jour 3)
4. Offre de d√©mo (Jour 4)

#### Message d'Abandon :
- Reconnaissance polie
- Explication claire
- Garder la porte ouverte pour le futur

## üîß Configuration Avanc√©e

### Configuration de l'Agent de R√©ponse IA :
1. Mettez √† jour l'invite syst√®me avec les informations de votre entreprise
2. Ajoutez des mod√®les de questions/r√©ponses courants
3. D√©finissez des r√®gles d'escalade
4. Configurez les pr√©f√©rences linguistiques

### Options d'Enrichissement des Leads :
- Ajoutez des cl√©s API pour des sources de donn√©es suppl√©mentaires
- Configurez les champs d'enrichissement
- D√©finissez des seuils de qualit√© des donn√©es
- Activez la d√©tection des doublons

### Int√©gration du Calendrier :
- D√©finissez les heures de r√©union disponibles
- Configurez la dur√©e des r√©unions
- Ajoutez des temps de tampon
- D√©finissez la gestion des fuseaux horaires

## üìä Suivi et Optimisation

### Suivre les Indicateurs Cl√©s :
- Volume de leads par classification
- Taux de r√©ponse
- Taux de conversion des d√©mos
- Temps jusqu'√† la premi√®re r√©ponse
- Taux de succ√®s d'enrichissement

### Conseils d'Optimisation :
1. **Revue R√©guli√®re** : V√©rifiez l'exactitude de la classification chaque semaine
2. **Tests A/B** : Testez diff√©rentes s√©quences d'emails
3. **Boucle de Retour** : Utilisez les r√©sultats pour affiner les crit√®res ICP
4. **Formation IA** : Mettez √† jour les invites en fonction des r√©sultats

## üéâ Meilleures Pratiques

1. **Commencez Simple** : Commencez avec des crit√®res de base et affinez au fil du temps
2. **Testez Minutieusement** : Utilisez des leads de test avant de passer en direct
3. **Surveillez Quotidiennement** : V√©rifiez les journaux pendant la premi√®re semaine
4. **It√©rez Rapidement** : Ajustez en fonction des r√©sultats
5. **Documentez les Changements** : Gardez une trace des mises √† jour des crit√®res

## üìà Mise √† l'√âchelle de Votre Workflow

√Ä mesure que le volume de vos leads augmente :
1. **Ajoutez des Sous-Workflows** : S√©parez les processus complexes
2. **Impl√©mentez le Mise en File d'Attente** : G√©rez les volumes √©lev√©s
3. **Ajoutez une Int√©gration CRM** : Synchronisez avec vos outils de vente
4. **Activez l'Analyse** : Suivez des indicateurs d√©taill√©s
5. **Configurez des Alertes** : Surveillez les probl√®mes

workflow.name: AI Lead Enrichment, Qualification and Follow-Up

parameters.message:
=Hello {{ $('Input Form').item.json.Name }},

Thank you for your message and interest.

Regarding your inquiry:
"{{ $('Input Form').item.json.Message }}"

Unfortunately, {{ $('Input Form').item.json.Company }} does not currently meet our requirements for a partnership. We focus exclusively on companies that meet our specific criteria for size, location, and service needs.

Should your situation change or if you have any questions, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
[Your Company Team]

P.S. Feel free to visit our website for more information: [Your Website URL]
parameters.subject: Re: Your Inquiry

assignments.name: ICP
assignments.value:
ICP Criteria: Define your Ideal Customer Profile here. Example criteria:
- Company Size: Define minimum employee count (e.g., 50+ employees)
- Industry: List target industries (e.g., Tech, Finance, Healthcare, Manufacturing)
- Geography: Specify target regions (e.g., North America, Europe, specific countries)
- Pain Points: List problems your solution solves (e.g., manual processes, compliance issues, high costs)
- Other Requirements: Annual revenue, technology stack, specific needs

assignments.name: demo-ready
assignments.value:
Demo-Ready: "High-Intent Prospects with Clear Needs"

Define criteria for demo-ready leads. Example:

Required: [Your primary requirement, e.g., specific region or company size]

Qualifying Criteria (need 2+ of these):
- Company Size: [Your threshold]
- Industries: [Your target industries]
- Volume/Usage: [Expected usage levels]
- Has relevant team/department
- Message indicates: urgent needs, specific challenges, requests demo, mentions pain points

Examples:
1. Large Enterprise (1000+ employees) - Message: "We need to automate our processes"
2. Mid-Market Company (200+ employees) - Message: "Looking for solution to reduce costs"
3. Growing Startup (50+ employees) - Message: "Need to scale our operations"

assignments.name: nurture
assignments.value:
Nurture: "Prospects with Future Potential"

Define criteria for nurture leads. Example:

Required: [Your basic requirement]

Qualifying Criteria (ANY of these):
- Company Size: [Lower threshold]
- ANY company in target industry
- Message indicates: general interest, exploring options, budget constraints, future planning

Key Rule: If they meet basic requirements and could benefit from your solution, default to nurture

Examples:
1. Small Company (20+ employees) - Message: "Interested in learning about your solutions"
2. Growing Startup (30+ employees) - Message: "Planning to implement next year"
3. Mid-size Company - Message: "What are the benefits of your solution?"

assignments.name: drop
assignments.value:
Drop: "Only Non-Target or No Relevance"

Drop ONLY if:
- Does NOT meet geographic requirements
- OR meets location but:
  - Below minimum size threshold AND no growth potential
  - Wrong industry (B2C when you serve B2B)
  - Individual consumers or very small businesses
  - Already using competitor with long-term contract
  - Government with multi-year procurement cycles
- Message indicates: spam, unrelated request, explicitly states no need

Examples:
1. International company outside target region
2. B2C retail shop (when you serve B2B)
3. Individual freelancer
4. Company using competitor - Message: "Happy with current solution"
5. Test messages or spam

parameters.content:
## üéØ Nurture Follow-Up Sequence

### Configuration:
1. **Wait Times**: Adjust the wait nodes between emails (currently 1 day each)
2. **Email Content**: Customize the nurture emails with your value propositions
3. **Calendar Integration**: Update demo invitation with your calendar details

### Sequence:
1. Initial acknowledgment email with resources
2. Follow-up with educational content/webinar
3. Final demo invitation after nurturing

## ‚úÖ Demo-Ready Follow-Up

### Configuration:
1. **Calendar Event**: Configure with your Google Calendar
2. **Meeting Duration**: Default 1 hour (adjust as needed)
3. **Auto-scheduling**: Next business day at 12 PM
4. **Meeting Link**: Automatically includes Google Meet

## ‚ùå Drop Follow-Up

### Configuration:
1. **Drop Message**: Customize the polite rejection email
2. **Keep Door Open**: Mention they can reach out if situation changes
3. **Website Link**: Add your company website URL

## ü§ñ Lead Classification

### How it Works:
- AI analyzes leads based on your ICP criteria
- Classifies into: demo-ready, nurture, or drop
- Uses GPT-4o for accurate classification

### Setup:
1. Edit the "Define ICP and Lead Criteria" node
2. Customize the three classification categories
3. Add your specific requirements and examples































### Future Improvements:
- Train with your historical lead data
- Add more granular scoring system
- Integrate with your CRM for better classification

## üìä Lead Enrichment

### How it Works:
- AI searches for company information
- Extracts pain points from user message
- Enriches with company size, industry, location

### Setup:
1. Ensure OpenAI API key is configured
2. Uses GPT-4o-mini with search capabilities

































### Future Improvements:
- Add more data sources (LinkedIn, Clearbit, etc.)
- Integrate with company databases
- Add technographic data enrichment

## üì• Input Form & Logging

### Setup Required:
1. **Form Webhook**: Copy the form URL after saving workflow
2. **Google Sheets**: Create a new sheet with columns:
   - Date, Name, Email, Company, Job Title, Message
   - Number of Employees, Industry, Geography
   - Annual Revenue, Technology, Pain Points
   - Lead Classification
3. **Update Sheet ID**: Replace YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID in all Google Sheets nodes

### Future Improvements:
- Connect to your website form via webhook
- Add form validation
- Implement duplicate detection

# üöÄ AI Lead Generation and Follow-Up Workflow

### Overview:
This workflow automatically processes incoming leads, enriches them with company data, classifies them using AI, and sends appropriate follow-up sequences.

### Prerequisites:
1. **OpenAI API Key**: For AI classification and enrichment
2. **Google Workspace**: Gmail, Sheets, and Calendar access
3. **n8n**: Self-hosted or cloud instance

### Quick Start:
1. Import this workflow
2. Update all credential nodes with your accounts
3. Create a Google Sheet for lead logging
4. Customize the ICP criteria and email templates
5. Test with sample leads before going live

## üí¨ AI Answer Agent







### How it Works:
- Analyzes if message needs immediate response
- Can answer basic questions automatically
- Escalates complex queries to your team

### Setup:
1. **Escalation Email**: Replace "your-email@company.com" with your sales team email
2. **Knowledge Base**: Add your company info to the AI agent
3. **Auto-responses**: Customize for common questions

### Future Improvements:
- Separate workflow for complex Q&A
- Add company knowledge base
- Enable conversation logging

values.placeholder: Tell us about your needs and challenges...

parameters.text: =We received the message "{{ $json.Message }}" from "{{ $json.Name }}", who is "{{ $json['Job Title'] }}" at "{{ $json.Company }}". The email is "{{ $json.Email }}"

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant for [Your Company Name]. Your job is to evaluate incoming customer questions and determine whether you can provide a confident, accurate answer directly, if the inquiry requires human expertise, or if the message requires no response at all.

Input Information:
You will receive: We received the message "{{ $json.Message }}" from "{{ $json.Name }}", who is "{{ $json['Job Title'] }}" at "{{ $json.Company }}". The email is "{{ $json.Email }}"

Decision Criteria:
‚úÖ You CAN answer confidently when:
- Questions about general features and capabilities
- Basic product information and benefits
- General pricing structure questions
- Technical requirements and compatibility
- Demo scheduling requests
- General industry questions

‚ùå You CANNOT answer and must escalate when:
- Specific pricing quotes or custom deals
- Technical implementation details
- Legal compliance questions
- Account-specific issues
- Partnership requests
- Complaints or escalations

üö´ NO RESPONSE needed when:
- Test messages
- Spam or irrelevant content
- Messages with no clear question
- Automated messages

Response Instructions:
- Language: Respond in the same language as the customer's message
- Personalization: Address the customer by name
- Professional Closing: Always end with proper signature
- CRITICAL: ALL escalations go to your-email@company.com

Response Format:
When you CAN answer:
{
	"Sending To": "{{ $json.Email }}",
	"Subject": "Re: Your inquiry about [topic]",
	"Message": "Your personalized answer"
}

When you CANNOT answer:
{
	"Sending To": "your-email@company.com",
	"Subject": "Customer Inquiry Escalation - {{ $json.Company }}",
	"Message": "Customer inquiry requires human expertise..."
}

When NO RESPONSE:
{}

parameters.text:
=Complete the following lead information by using your knowledge and web search. Make sure not to include uncertain information.

Enrich the following input company lead:
"{{ $json.Company }}"

User Message:
"{{ $json.Message }}"

Analyze the message to extract pain points and specific needs. Include these in the painpoints field.

Fill as much of the information schema below as clearly possible. Use appropriate number formatting for your region.

{
"Number of Employees": "",
"Industry": "",
"geography": "",
"annual revenue": "",
"technology": "",
"painpoints": "[Extract from message + research]"
}

Your output MUST adhere to the JSON format defined above. No other text is allowed. DO NOT enclose the JSON in ```json ... ```

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant that enriches a lead with relevant information and extracts pain points from their message.

options.systemPromptTemplate:
=You are an expert B2B sales qualification agent. Analyze leads based on our Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) and their message content.

{{ $json.ICP }}

IMPORTANT: Pay special attention to the user's message. Strong pain points or urgent needs in the message can upgrade a lead's classification. Be inclusive - when in doubt, choose nurture over drop.

Make sure to only select exactly ONE classification category!

- Pricing and implementation
- Q&A

Looking forward to meeting you!

Best regards,
[Your Company] Team

parameters.content:
### üìã Demo-Ready Actions:
- Update log file with enriched data
- Send immediate calendar invitation

### Future Improvements:
- Add CRM integration
- Send prep materials before demo
- Automated reminders

### üìß Nurture Actions:
- Update log file
- Send educational resources
- Follow up with event invite
- Final demo scheduling

### Future Improvements:
- Personalized content paths
- Lead scoring updates
- Multi-channel follow-up

### üö´ Drop Actions:
- Update log file
- Send polite decline message
- Keep door open for future

### Future Improvements:
- Reason tracking
- Re-engagement campaigns
- Referral opportunities

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.
